name: 5:5 The Grim Reaper - A MÖRK BORG monster
name_original: 5:5 The Grim Reaper - A MÖRK BORG monster
description:
The sky shall weep fire and a great stone shall plummet as a city fallen from heaven. Its gift is Death, and madness is its herald.
- The Calendar of Nechrubel, Psalm 5 Verse 5

5:5 The Grim Reaper is content compatible with MÖRK BORG, the Ennie award-winning apocalyptic fantasy TTRPG.

This one-page PDF contains a stat block for The Grim Reaper, a monster you can use in gameplay should you roll for this misery on the Calendar of Nechrubel. It also includes a table with four scenarios to herald the coming of such a foe.

This content is offered as Pay-What-You-Want, including free.

Questions? Thoughts? Leave a comment below, or get in touch on Twitter.

If you like this you might also enjoy SKELETONZ, a one-page TTRPG written by me. You can check it out here.

5:5 The Grim Reaper is an independant production by Rob Currie and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.
